library(tidyverse)

library(RColorBrewer)

library(gridExtra)
library(gapminder)
library(socviz)

theme_set(theme_ipsum()+
          theme(strip.background =element_rect(fill="lightgray"),
                axis.title.x = 
                  element_text(angle = 0,
                               size = rel(1.33),
                               margin = margin(10,0,0,0)),
                axis.title.y = 
                  element_text(angle = 90,
                               size = rel(1.33),
                               margin = margin(0,10,0,0))
                )
          )
